channel.title: hackathon on Nirant Kasliwal
channel.description: Recent content in hackathon on Nirant Kasliwal

item.description: Hackathon Logistics Venue: Juspay Technologies Private Limited, Stallion Business Center, 444, 18th Main Rd, 6th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru - 560095 Entry Enter venue from basement; parking for 40 two-wheelers, cars park in side lanes/roads Show government ID to security person, Shankar Dutta, at basement for check-in Check-ins start at 3:15 PM; hackathon starts at 4 PM; schedule: https://hasgeek.com/generativeAI/deep-hackathon/schedule Assemble on 2nd floor, work on 2nd and 3rd floors after 5 PM briefing Guest WiFi access available; login and password details at venue Follow Code of Conduct; be respectful, collaborate, and ask questions
